entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
